title: Mastery 5, got an S-, but no mastery 6 token. Why?
body: I was playing an ARAM game as Hec (who I am level 5 with) and got an S- but I did not get a mastery 6 token. Does this have anything to do with my next chest not available for 4 days or is this wrong? Or is it not possible to get tokens in ARAM games?

replies.body: You can only earn the mastery tokens on normal and ranked Summoner's Rift matches. You cannot earn them on ARAM, Twisted Treeline, or any of the rotating game modes.

This is correct info here. It looks like the recent Hecarim games were played in ARAM, so they wouldn't be eligible for mastery tokens. More info on this system can be found on the [Champion Mastery Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide)
Thanks for this! Was wondering why I didn't earn tokens - I was playing ARAM.
I have gotten a few S grading on maokai still not having lvl 6 mastery is there a reason? just curious both in ranked if that counts
Also fairly certain it requires an S or S+ as opposed to an S-.
That's only if you're trying to get level 7 mastery tokens. If you're going for level 6 mastery tokens, an S- is acceptable.

> [{quoted}](name=JunkMasterson,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qfGi735J,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-14T04:05:19.796+0000)
>
> Also fairly certain it requires an S or S+ as opposed to an S-.

S- S and S+ get you level 6 tokens. S and S+ get you level 7 tokens

Got an S+ on leona but did not get my Mastery token or a chest.
I belive it sould give it right?
I have gotten two S grading on maokai and i have yet to receive lvl mastery 6
